title: NEW Accound
body:
I have known, the New account  comes with some Riot Point. 

In order to buy champ with low-level. I need some point. However, I do not have it at all. 

please let me know

replies.body: As lew mentioned, new accounts no longer gain IP.  They will now receive some introductory materials to hextech crafting known as a [new player chest](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp).  Enjoy!

New accounts don't get RP at level 3 anymore but you should get a special [chest ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)after you reach level 5.
